name: Atalho inc. - Beta
description:
Purtuguês Brasil

Reder is a girl who suffers from emotional problems and several other psychological ...

With this, his parents look for the shortcut inc. a company that aims to cure these psychological problems ...

But that healing eventually worsened the situation by making Reder cure himself of these problems with his "Worst Nightmare"!

Guide Reder in his nightmare to end his emotional torture ...
